meanings.definition: A type of painting using opaque watercolors.
meanings.sent1: She learned to create beautiful gouaches in art class.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed stunning gouaches by local artists.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the gouaches, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she painted with gouaches, turning the paper into a magical world.
meanings.sent5: The vivid gouaches captured the essence of the countryside perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The gallery featured a collection of exquisite gouaches.
meanings.sent2: Art enthusiasts admired the intricate details in the gouaches.
meanings.sent3: The auctioneer mistakenly sold the valuable gouaches for a bargain.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were like a series of gouaches, each layer revealing a different aspect of his feelings.
meanings.sent5: The gouaches on display seemed to come alive with vibrant colors.
